content: an updated and enlarged version of the crochet snowman applique 1 materials bernat super value in white red black or aqua blue and a bit of orange size h crochet hook 2 small safety eyes for the eyes and 3 slightly bigger safety eyes for the buttons tapestry needle finished size approximately 7 inches tall by 5 inches wide 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/snowman-applique-9
